title: Atlas Sub-Cluster Record
description: Hierarchy-aware sub-cluster metadata emitted by the Atlas CLI subcluster command.

anchor_id.description: Anchor identifier that owns the sub-cluster.

subcluster_id.description: Stable identifier assigned to the sub-cluster lineage.

parent_subcluster_id.description: Identifier of the parent sub-cluster when nested.

lineage.description: Ordinal lineage for the sub-cluster encoded as dotted triplets (e.g., 001.002).

depth.description: Depth of the sub-cluster within the hierarchy (1-indexed).

store_count.description: Number of stores contained within the sub-cluster.

store_ids.description: Store identifiers assigned to the sub-cluster.

centroid_lat.description: Optional latitude for the sub-cluster centroid in decimal degrees.

centroid_lon.description: Optional longitude for the sub-cluster centroid in decimal degrees.

metadata.description: Additional attributes associated with the sub-cluster.
